Description: All course curricula and materials remain the sole copyright of the instructor.
All external sources are cited with direct hyperlinks in reports and materials.
A 15-minute live Q&A session is held immediately following each lecture.
Real-time online lectures via Google Meet are preferred.
Summary PDF handouts are distributed post-lecture. Original PPT files are not provided.
Intensive coaching sessions for small groups (4–5 people) are available.
Customized curricula ranging from beginner to expert professional levels.
Commercial resale of lecture recordings is strictly prohibited.
Private webinars via YouTube Live are supported.
All lecture content is updated with the latest industry data every H1 (First Half).
Pre-reading materials are distributed to maximize learning efficiency.
A maximum of 20 participants is recommended for hands-on workshop efficiency.
Digital Certificates of Completion (PDF) are issued upon request.
Hands-on environments are provided via Google Colab.
On-site visits are available upon request; travel expenses are billed separately.
AI-powered real-time captions are available for English-language sessions.
High-definition broadcasts using a Logitech 4K Cam and Blue Yeti Mic.
Recorded content can be uploaded to the client’s Learning Management System.
Satisfaction surveys are conducted via Google Forms after every session.
ENTJ: I prefer systematic, strategy-driven approaches.
Based in South Korea, operating globally via remote collaboration.
07:00–09:00 KST is reserved for self-development; responses may be delayed.
My mission is to empower others through the systematic sharing of knowledge.
I spend weekends hiking to generate new lecture ideas.
Foreign currency transfers are accepted via PayPal, Stripe, and Wise.
Tuition fees must be paid in full 7 days prior to the start date.
Withholding taxes for international payments are the responsibility of the client.
A 5% weekly surcharge is added to all overdue payments.
PayPal receipts are provided for corporate expense documentation.
Official invoices are issued via email and hosted on Google Drive.
A 5% credit is applied to repeat lecture bookings.
For early termination, refunds are provided for remaining sessions only.
Work begins only after signing an NDA to protect client management data.
Electronic contracts are sent and signed via DocuSign.
Secondary modification or redistribution of materials requires prior negotiation.
Project extensions require mutual agreement 2 weeks in advance.
Please book sessions via the Calendly link (integrated with Google Calendar).
Registered business address for tax and accounting purposes is in Seoul.
Cancellations within 24 hours of a meeting incur a 50% session fee.
Monthly industry trend reports are distributed via newsletter.
I contribute professional columns to Medium and Brunch.
Annual speaker at global tech and strategy conferences.
A 10% discount is offered on the next session for successful referrals.
All business accounts are secured with Google OTP (2-Factor Authentication).
Sensitive credentials are shared exclusively via Bitwarden.
Project data is permanently deleted 6 months after the termination date.
All meeting transcripts and documents are backed up to Google Drive.
A 15-minute compatibility consultation is provided free of charge.
Communication is handled via Email and Slack, except for emergencies.
Business consulting is available in both Korean and English.
Real-time responses are available Mon–Fri, 09:00–18:00 (GMT+9).
Appropriate use of emojis is encouraged for flexible and fluid communication.
Maintenance for existing clients is treated as the highest priority.
Integrated solutions are provided through a network of subject matter experts.
All documents are delivered digitally to support paperless values.
Notion workspaces are created for long-term project asset sharing.
Holiday schedules are announced via email 2 weeks in advance.
Detailed career history is available on my LinkedIn profile.
Real-time insights are shared via X (Twitter) and LinkedIn.
Holder of Google Analytics and PMP certifications.
Expert in data-driven marketing strategy and organizational culture.
Author of strategy-related e-books available on Amazon Kindle.
Client logos and success stories are public on my website (subject to NDA).
MBA holder from a university in the United States.
Market research using Google Search and premium analytic tools.
A 1.5x premium rate applies to same-day urgent advisory requests.
Assistance with Google Workspace implementation for operational efficiency.
Shared office meeting rooms (e.g., WeWork) are used for offline sessions.
Includes analysis of global best practices in comparable industries.
Reports are available in either Google Slides or Google Docs.
One follow-up meeting per month for 30 days post-project is included.
Specific KPIs are established and measured at project kickoff.
Scope excludes operational execution (agency work) unless specified.
Monthly subscription models for unlimited Q&A are available.
Emergency response scenarios are provided within 24 hours of risk detection.
Stakeholder 1:1 interviews are limited to 45 minutes per session.
Consultation rate is set at $200 per hour.
A comprehensive PDF report containing analysis and execution roadmaps.
Pre-diagnosis is conducted via Google Forms during the first session.
On-site business visits and interviews are conducted when necessary.
